author: rich
msg: In revision 164185, which added/changed attributes in the <build-*> macros, I missed several things:
- The attributes for <build-webservices> need to line up with the attributes from the rest of the macros.
- The netui-blank/build.xml script was updated, but I missed 'destdir' on <build-pageflows>, which was split into 'weboutputdir' and 'classoutputdir'.
- The netui-samples/WEB-INF/src/build-dist.xml wasn't updated at all.
This change fixes all of the above.
tests: drt in trunk, run.test.dist (and build.dist.full) in trunk (WinXP)
